snippet: Mario Ernesto Villanueva Madrid pleaded guilty, in a federal court in Manhattan on Thursday, to conspiring to launder millions of dollars in narcotics bribe payments that he received from the Juárez drug gang.
abstract: Former Mexican state governor Mario Ernesto Villanueva Madrid pleads guilty in federal court in New York City to conspiring to launder millions of dollars in narcotics bribe payments that he received from the Juarez drug gang.
lead_paragraph: Mario Ernesto Villanueva Madrid pleaded guilty, in a federal court in Manhattan on Thursday, to conspiring to launder millions of dollars in narcotics bribe payments that he received from the Juárez drug gang.
